rows.label: xs08100100_MSG0001
rows.name: Looks like a number of enemy Skells have entered the city.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08100100_MSG0002
rows.name:
Agreed—let's give every Ganglion we can find
a nice, warm welcome.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08100100_MSG0005
rows.name:
The gates are sealed. And even if they weren't,
the city's surrounded by their ground forces. Forget it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08100100_MSG0006
rows.name: We have no choice here. It's kill or be killed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08100100_MSG0008
rows.name: we got a situation in the commercial district.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08100100_MSG0009
rows.name:
Two really nasty SOBs.
They're tearing through everything we throw at 'em![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08100100_MSG0010
rows.name: Secure your area and get over there ASAP![ST:wait ]
